Model.name: resource
Model.Doc: This model specifies the elements which make up a Mondrian resource file. See {@link ResourceGenTask} for more information.

Element.Doc: A ResourceBundle is a collection of resources. The resource generator generates a class from a resource bundle which has an accessor method for each resource.

Attribute.name: locale
Attribute.Doc: The locale of resources in this resource bundle, for example, "en_US_Boston", "en_US", or "en".

Object.name: code
Object.Doc: Text within this element is included in the generated class.

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.Doc: The name of this message or error, unique within this resource bundle.

Element.Doc: An exception defines a message which is issued in response to some invalid condition. It has a type, which must be derived from {@link Throwable}. The generated newExceptionName method creates an instance of this exception with the appropriate parameters.

Attribute.name: className
Attribute.Doc: The name of the exception class. Must be fully qualified, unless it is in the package java.lang. If not specified, the resource bundle's default exception class is used.
